entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:57 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:57 PM CST Friday 10 February 2023
